about_the_game:
This Fan Pack contains:
- Soundtrack selection (5 mp3 files)*
- 4 uncompressed original PSD files, used for the Live2D animations of the XXX scenes in the game
- Exclusive nude version final wallpaper (only available here)
- Handwritten "thank you" message

To find them:
1. Open Steam, go to the Library tab, and right-click on "Oppaidius Desert Island!" in your game list.
2. Select Properties and click the Local Files tab.
3. Click the Browse Local Files... button.
4. Open the "FanPack" folder!

Thanks for your support! ♡

* Angela's Theme - Octopus' Theme - Rika's Theme - Dan-dan's Theme by Luca Della Regina
Angela's Theme Arrange Ver. by Tsuyoshi Kaneko

content_descriptors.notes:
The PSD files contains the same XXX scenes appearing in Oppaidius Desert Island! game.
Vaginal sex, anal sex.

detailed_description:
This Fan Pack contains:
- Soundtrack selection (5 mp3 files)*
- 4 uncompressed original PSD files, used for the Live2D animations of the XXX scenes in the game
- Exclusive nude version final wallpaper (only available here)
- Handwritten "thank you" message

To find them:
1. Open Steam, go to the Library tab, and right-click on "Oppaidius Desert Island!" in your game list.
2. Select Properties and click the Local Files tab.
3. Click the Browse Local Files... button.
4. Open the "FanPack" folder!

Thanks for your support! ♡

* Angela's Theme - Octopus' Theme - Rika's Theme - Dan-dan's Theme by Luca Della Regina

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 175 MB available space
